name: The Ghost of Aeon
description:
The Ghost of Aeon is a retro endless runner game.

Try to break my Highscore of 1024. I bet you can't beat me :p

Controlls:

Move up: [Upper Arrow]

Move down: [Down Arrow]

Tips:

- You can easily change the volume of sounds  in the options

- If  you press  buttons, but the game doesnt react, click one time with your left mouse on the game
